descriptionlist.description: Add custom widgets right on your homescreen. This includes widgets such as time/date and apple's today widgets.
Widgets can be selected by tapping on a placeholder icon in wiggle mode.
Developers, if you want to create your own custom widgets take a look at documentation link below.

changelog.change: Improve placement of accessory buttons when widget is small
Fix crash when swiping between pages with today widgets
Fix today widget recognizing touches when scrolling between pages
make it easier to create custom modern widget view controllers for developers
Fix insufficient space widgets filtering to not include widgets whose instance limit has been reached
Make it easier for developers to set the corner radius of custom widgets
